pr_title: Migrate contacts backup job to new background job manager API

timeline.bodyText: fine for now while we should probably find a richer name at some point
timeline.author: AndyScherzinger

replies.bodyText:
As described by me and Chris, let us better go with removing Lombok for the problematic parameters and if needed change to Kotlin for those files.
Adding this, even temporary, just asks for trouble, or harder understanding of code.
replies.author: tobiasKaminsky

replies.bodyText: I'll remove it of course. This was just a temporary hack.
replies.author: ezaquarii

replies.bodyText: Removed. Now the offending property has explicit accessors.
replies.author: ezaquarii
